document.full_text: a small group of french activists have organized an internet campaign to send roses to the woman who has accused former imf head dominique strauss-kahn of attempting to rape her in new york.
document.title: french website sends flowers to maid in dsk case
lines_and_colors: a small group of french activists have organized an internet campaign to send roses to the woman who has accused former imf head dominique strauss-kahn of attempting to rape her in new york.
